column9: This was prescribed for me because I was getting dizzy, and sometimes falling or walking into walls.  I took this for about 2 weeks and quit it.  I felt like I had narcolepsy, and would close my eyes and fall asleep anytime.  What made it really bad, and the main reason I quit taking it was I would struggle to stay  awake while driving..
